ie.gmit.sw.ai.fight

Class FightCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.ai.fight.FightCtrl

  • public class FightCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the fighting between a player and an enemy. Uses FuzzyScore class in order to take use of fuzzy logic.
    Author:
    Ronan
